Class Adjective

java.lang.Object
  Word
      Adjective

public class Adjective
extends Word

Representation of an adjective in a non-specified language

Version:
15.05.12
Author:
Michael Taft Morris

Constructor Summary
Adjective(String w, String s)
          In English, adjectives don't agree with their nouns, so here is a constructor for those adjectives.
Adjective(String w, String p, String ss, String sp)
          Constructor for a Quenya adjective.

Constructor Detail

Adjective

public Adjective(String w,
                 String s)
In English, adjectives don't agree with their nouns, so here is a constructor for those adjectives.

Parameters:
w - The basic form of the adjective.
s - The superlative form of the adjective.

Adjective

public Adjective(String w,
                 String p,
                 String ss,
                 String sp)
Constructor for a Quenya adjective.

Parameters:
w - The basic form of the adjective.
p - The form of the adjective that agrees with a plural noun.
ss - The singular superlative form of the adjective.
sp - The plural superlative form of the adjective.
Method Detail

getPlural

public String getPlural()
Getter method for the plural form of the adjective.

Returns:
The plural form of the adjective.

getSuperlative

public String getSuperlative(boolean sing)
Getter method for either superlative form of the adjective.

Parameters:
sing - A boolean value representing the number of the noun to be described; true : singular, false: plural.
Returns:
The superlative form of the adjective.
